timeline.bodyText: Why do we have the parameterSetFile here? I was expecting to have only an Id (that will be either the static Id o the dynamic model Id) and a parameter Id. Am I wrong?
timeline.author: agnesLeroy

timeline.message:
rename DynamicModelExtension to DynamicModelGroovyExtension

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not sure the name of this class is clear enough: we do not know the purpose of the mapping.
Do we really want this empty method? Does it make sense to have an empty mapping? It seems to be used in the unit-test, so maybe we should remove this method from the API and move it to the test sources
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText: Yes I agree it should be moved to the test sources
replies.author: agnesLeroy

replies.bodyText: Agree on the comments about the name of the class. @mathbagu suggestion of renaming from MappingSupplier to DynamicModelsSupplier is ok for me
replies.author: zamarrenolm

timeline.bodyText: Same remark about the name of the class
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: we should also change this option's name
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: And give more detail in the description
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText: Would "Dynamic models description as a Groovy file: defines the dynamic models to be associated to chosen equipments of the network" be enough?
replies.author: agnesLeroy

timeline.bodyText: This option is required so this test is useless.
